activities: Crimcheck.com is committed to protecting our clients brand, reputation, employees and customers by providing comprehensive, expert background checks and innovative business and technology solutions. At Crimcheck.com we are committed to respecting your privacy. In general, you can visit Crimcheck.com on the Internet without identifying yourself or revealing any personal information. Once you choose to provide us personally identifiable information (any information by which you can be identified), you can be assured that it will only be used to support your customer relationship with Crimcheck.com.
